parameters:
Depending on the choices, the game over or heroine
may suffer a terrible fate.

Before such events, there will be a confirmation
to save, so please make use of it.
Are you ready in your heart?
あ、いえ、まだちょっと・・・

Village Chief - I heard there's something you
wanted to talk about?
Yes, yes, I have something on my mind.

How are both of you doing? As for Light, how is
he?

I heard that you collapsed and was worried, but I
conveyed that you didn't seem to be in any special
bad condition.

I wonder if you just got a little tired? I didn't
think much of it beyond that.

Hmm, hmm, actually, things have become a bit
troublesome.

Before the two of you arrived, I checked on
Light's condition, and there was a \c[2]black
pattern\c[0] floating around his left arm.

Is this the same symptom as the curse that has
been passed down in the village?
I-Is that so! Is he going to be okay with that!?
I'm sorry, I don't know the details...

It is said that those who receive the curse will
gain \c[2]power akin to that of a demon\c[0] and
\c[2]supreme happiness\c[0].

...Leaving aside the power of a demon, isn't it a
good thing to have the ultimate happiness come
your way?

I don't know for sure, but it's probably not all
good things.

That's right... What should we do? I wonder if
Light is okay?

Seeing the flustered Lira, I can't help but feel
anxious myself, but I can't just stand by and
watch misfortune befall my best friend.

I asked the village chief if there was a way to
lift the curse.
I'm sorry, I don't know the details...

...If there's anything, it would probably be the
\c[2]Larius Ruins\c[0].

North of this village, deep within the forest,
lies the ruins. That is the Larius Ruins.

It is said that there are countless demons inside,
and not only children but even adults are
forbidden to approach the ruins.

This curse may be related to the wicked demons
said to reside at the deepest part of the ruins.

I understand that you want to aim for that place,
but it's very dangerous to do so, even if it's for
Light's sake...

I want to do what I can, whether it's dangerous or
not, without even thinking about it.

I don't know what I can do, but I can't just stand
by and watch the two of you in silence!
...I see, it seems Light has a good friend.

I will also lend my strength as much as I can.
This is not much, but it's a selection.

There may not be much available in the village,
but I should be able to be flexible with various
things.

Thank you so much for all of this! Before heading
to the ruins, let's buy something from Margaret's
place!

Let's prepare at the \c[2]item shop\c[0] and then
head to the \c[2]Larius Ruins\c[0].
...No one would speak ill of you for going to die.

Even though it's for the sake of a dear friend, I
can't just go without hesitation. Scary things are
still scary.
...\n[1]'s an idiot! But I'll still help him!

...Leave the rest to me. There may be someone in
the village who can help.

I don't think poorly of you, so don't overthink
it...

Before long, various incidents occurred in the
village, but I could only watch over all of them.

Only the days of regret and frustration pass by
mercilessly

When I suddenly looked up, I saw that dear friend
happily smiling.

Azami-san said she wanted to talk to the village
chief!

\n[1] always forgets important things like that so
easily.

Let's go see the village chief before we head
outside.

Let's go to the village chief's place before
heading outside.

I will continue to investigate on my end, so
please be very careful.

Don't worry, Village Chief! It's not a problem for
the sake of my friends.

I conveyed my thanks for the camping set I
received from Light earlier.
Ah, please don't worry about that matter.

I am investigating the curse, but the solution is
far off.

I'm sorry for the worn-out condition, but please
use it if it can be of any help.
I'm counting on you, \n[1], to take care of Light.

I'm sorry, it's been quite hectic since this
morning.

Hmm... Right now, she's still sleeping, but it
doesn't seem like there's anything particularly
wrong.

The influence of the curse... or something like
that

At the moment, there don't seem to be any symptoms
like that for Azami... but

No... it's nothing. There have been various things
happening recently, so it's probably because of
that.

It's true that there have been various things
happening, especially Azami-san might have been a
bit reliant...

Sorry \n[1], it looks like exploration will be a
bit difficult today too.
If Lira collapses too, it will be unbearable.

What the two of you are saying is reasonable. I'll
leave the exploration to you two.

I'm sorry for causing trouble for all three of
you.
No! Now is the time to do our best!

I think we can overcome this by helping each
other!

Thank you... \n[1], please be very careful during
the exploration.
I'm sorry I can't go with you today.

When Azami-san gets better and calms down, let's
go together again.
Let's leave Azami-san alone while she's sleeping.
